original_text: Then Herod summoned the wise men secretly and ascertained from them what time the star had appeared.
korean_text: 이에 헤롯이 가만히 박사들을 불러 별이 나타난 때를 자세히 묻고

sentences.original_text: Then Herod summoned the wise men secretly
and ascertained from them what time the star had appeared
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들에게서 별이 언제 나타났는지 알아냈습니다
